title: Cross-Platform Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Short intensive course focusing on strengthening competencies in creating language education content using diverse platforms (mobile, tablet, PC) in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design effective language-learning activities in a cross-platform environment.
Learners can develop language education materials integrating multimedia elements (videos, interactive quizzes, AR content, etc.).
Learners can conceptualize project-based assessment frameworks applicable to real-world business environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
